official_title: MyPatientPal: An App to Help Patients Manage Their Cancer Care
inclusion_criteria:
* Have a diagnosis of any solid tumor cancer
* Be starting treatment using an oral cancer therapeutic agent
* Be able to speak, read, and write English
* Willing and able to use their smartphone to use MyPatientPal
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients with cognitive or perceptual disturbances
